PMHC MDS Update v1.14.5

We are pleased to announce that PMHC MDS Update v1.14.5 was released on December 12, 2021.

The following functionality has been implemented in the Tools menu:

  • Added the User Auditing tab. This tab allows users with the User Management role to review users who have not recently logged in to the PMHC MDS.

The following enhancements have been added to the Data Entry interface:

  • Added help links on all measure items.

The user guides have been updated to reflect these updates. They are available at https://docs.pmhc-mds.com/.

PMHC-MDS managed by Logicly
